column3: School of Computing and Mathematical Sciences
column5: Advance your career as a business analyst, web designer or systems developer with our Master’s in Computing and Information Systems.There is an increasing need within the computer science industry for professionals in business analysis, web design, system development and project management, as well as IT support and training. This MSc in Computing and Information Systems is designed to meet those needs.You'll explore software tools and techniques and systems modelling, alongside options that range from data warehousing and project management to developing mobile apps.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
